description: This source file implements the process logic for an Advanced Networking Service Container (ANSC) Broker Server TCP object, including functions to query process mode, process synchronously and asynchronously incoming data packets, for the purpose of handling TCP communication in the broker system.

methods.name: ULONG AnscBstoQuery(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,PANSC_HANDLE phQueryContext)
methods.description: Queries the desired process mode based on the incoming socket data and context.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscBstoProcessSync(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hQueryContext)
methods.description: Processes incoming data synchronously by delegating to the worker's ProcessSync method.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscBstoProcessAsync(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hQueryContext)
methods.description: Processes incoming data asynchronously by disabling receive, spawning a worker task, and returning status.
